participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, enjoys engaging in light-hearted conversations.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a suburban area, and she has a degree in communication. She loves meeting new people and often strikes up conversations wherever she goes.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, tends to make others smile with his witty remarks.
participant_2.background: Jordan comes from a diverse background, having lived in multiple cities. He works in marketing and enjoys socializing with friends during his free time.
